website_summaries.verdict: While it has some nice features for consumers who prefer light support in a wide design, we recommend others on our list for those who need stronger support.
pros: Wide, flat belt is easy to position and adjust and provides comfortable support
Is held in place by three Velcro straps - that's all
cons: Flexibility is the brace's asset and downfall
It does not provide enough support for some

customer_reviews.title: awesome replacement...
customer_reviews.text: ...for my 12 year old one my doctor prescribed. But that one I lost the "molded to my back" insert 6 years ago. So I bought this one and my back never felt so good. It has permanent stiff but bendable ribs in the back so it kind a molds itself to my back. It also has a "pre" velcro strap about 4 " wide that you fasten around first. It is attached to the large belt that is also very secure. It easily gives me one or two extra hours of reduced back pain. as without it I get about 3 or 4 hours out of my back a day. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SteveinEugene

customer_reviews.title: Feel Better
customer_reviews.text: Back braces found in local stores do not fit more than a 50” waist. If you can squeeze into them, they are uncomfortable and cannot provide real support. The XXXL opens to 53” comfortably supporting the wearer. This brace provides the wearer real support all day long. The brace has overlapping Velcro straps and one person can put the brace on without problems. With this brace supporting your back and you feel better at day’s end.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Durney

customer_reviews.title: good product  ,well made ,good price .
customer_reviews.text: Brace does what it is suppose to do ,make sure you order the proper size which seem to be accurate. One problem in my case is if you have a large belly it can cause stomach discomfort ,so use your own judgment when ordering. !
customer_reviews.author: vferne48Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: I read these reviews and thought great maybe this will fit
customer_reviews.text: I read these reviews and thought great maybe this will fit. Well it fits. That's about it. This stupid thing has three straps to it. I don't understand there re 3 straps. It's a complicated belt. I hate it. I will try to find something else. Also Don't buy this thing if you want to wear it under your clothes it's scratchy against the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine F. Olbeter

customer_reviews.title: I really happy w your product
customer_reviews.text: I am CNA and a HHA need to bending, lifting and twisted alot. The brace gave me all the lower support I was looking for. Also keep my abdomen in place. I really happy w your product!

customer_reviews.title: Staves of exploding back syndrome
customer_reviews.text: When I was a slave to the corporate entity this helped me stave off mental retardation from my back exploding. 10/10 would buy again if I was standing in one spot all day being a corporate zombie machine.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely big enough for me. What arrived was black ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely big enough for me. What arrived was black which is what I wanted. It has three bones in the back to help with support. It is a bit scratchy against bare skin but comfy over a t-shirt.

The darts in the back area poke into your back, and they are too flexible, they are not rigid like a corset would do. next time i will get one through my doctor at a medical supply store. waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: XXX-Large Back Brace with Lumbosacral Support
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to purchase this XXX-Large Back Brace with Ventilated Elastic Lumbosacral Support. It is an excellent back brace that supports my lower back. Amazon is my go to website for everything from A-Z. I would recommend to do business with this company in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice love the way it feels works really well

customer_reviews.text: It helped limit my lower back soreness during our cruise, which is why I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife who recently hurt her back. She uses it now all the time when washing dishes. She says its great and helps support her back while she works. Nice product. Its got three velcro straps. The main big one around the front, then another smaller one that criss crosses that to hold it in place, and then another from the other side to hold the second one in place. Its all velcro, but it will never come undone when you dont want it to.

customer_reviews.title: Back support, not a back brace
customer_reviews.text: This sold as a "Back Brace", but the packaging has it as a "Back Support". It may give support while lifting light objects or bending over, but if you have back problems, and need a brace that gives some stability this will not give you much more than a waist wrap. The 5 support stays in the back are soft and so flexible that they can be easily bent double and twisted 360 degrees. It will make your stomach and sides look trimmer, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Velcro on one side, wouldn't stay fastened after only ...
customer_reviews.text: Velcro on one side,wouldn't stay fastened after only wearing it once.

customer_reviews.text: My belt arrived earlier today, and I love it! I don't ever want to take it off! It feels fabulous.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely but the velcro stops almost 3" from the end causing an annoying flap that gets caught on everything
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely. According to size I should have ordered a 2X but ordered a 3X. It would not have fit with a 2X. The Velcro doesn't go to the end.... it stops almost 3 inches short of the end so there is this annoying flap. I an going to have to go to WalMart & buy some Velcro to install so I don't have this annoying flap that catches on stuff as I am trying to pack for moving & keeps coming off. I tried duct taping the flap down, but that doesn't work. If I wore it under my clothes that would solve the problem but I don't like the feel of it on my bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: Potluck Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 70 yr old ,6'2", 270 lb male. I LOVE this belt. Comfortable for daily use in Florida heat. Well-ventilated. Helps keep you stand erect. Great support when gardening or pushing the mower. It actually is two belts in one. Terrific customer support. Price well worth it. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: robertlinder

customer_reviews.title: good back brace
customer_reviews.text: Good back brace so far. I think it helps me. Only thing is whatever size you are, order the next size down. I'm a 3x ordered a 3x and didn't get tight enough. So I exchanged it for a 2x and it's perfect. The velcro seems super strong.
customer_reviews.author: Freese123

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well made and the only problem I have is that it is too large. I used the measurements provided and would only want anyone thinking of ordering this brace to re-measure and then perhaps order the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: Back problems. It helps and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Cadena

customer_reviews.title: Judging by other reviews, the Alpha Brace seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Judging by other reviews, the Alpha Brace seems to work for some people - but not for me. The material is highly abrasive - requiring it to be worn over clothing - and for those of us who pack too much weight around, the brace doesn't provide proper adjustments and, after wearing it for a while, it eventually gets all out of kilter in front - it kind of rolls over onto itself. The Mueller brace works perfectly for me - and it is a "one size fits all."
customer_reviews.author: Drone Man

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery because I am large around the middle and did not want the brace to keep popping open when I sat or cut off my breathing. This was the xxx large and it fit just great. I am 54" around the middle and this is just the right size. Great in black so I can wear it over or under my blouse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: It Does What I Need it To Do :)
customer_reviews.text: I like it because one can wear it under clothes and it DOES help. Is it a cure all - no. But it does really help on bad sciatica days. There is a tendency for the material to roll a bit when you loosened it (like an ankle brace, I found it impossible to keep it 'tight' for long periods of time). All in all, I am glad I bought it and it works for me better than some of the heavier, more confining braces.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Menter

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: The XXX size does not fit a 50" waist. Look for a larger one if you are bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Fit well and is helping someone that has had six back surgeries better than ones issued by the doctor and cost thousands more. Thank you for excellent service.

The boning is very weak and rolls easy and brace does not have enough support throughout the whole thing it's very lightweight and flimsy

I'm actually buying him another one right now as he's lost weight with the help from this brace. I definitely recommend this product.
